author: Brian Eskow
text: I‚Äôm not gay, but if I was, I would support gay rights. So, I support gay rights. I also believe religious freedom is worthy of respect.

author: Mrs. Betty Bowers
text: Religious Freedom means Christian Nationalists get to pretend there are 7 days of Hanukkah. Glory!

author: Ilyas SQR
text: Banning Halal Meat Certification through a pvt member bill in Karnataka is an attack on religious freedom. They( BJP) want to divert people's attention from real issues & polarize them on religious lines.

author: Dilpreet Chopra
text: It was reported earlier that #Pakistan was listed as a "Country of Particular Concern" by the United States in its yearly International Religious Freedom Report in June 2022. #Pakistan, Please let the world know the extent of your violence toward non-Muslim minorities.

author: Greg Newkirk
text: The only people I push away by making my socially progressive ideals known are people who can‚Äôt comprehend compassion, tolerance, or religious freedom, so I‚Äôd say that comprehending ‚Äúwonderous phenomena‚Äù might be a stretch. They turn it into demons anyway.

author: Susan RESISTS
text:
Hate, bigotry and homophobia disguised as religious freedom can be lethal. 

If your ‚Äú religion‚Äù supports discrimination and the oppression of others you‚Äôre in a cult.

author: Cate Eland
text:
1) This is a country with religious freedom. No one is required to conduct their marriage in accordance with a faith that is not their own.

2) It wouldn't say much for God if Christian marriages could be easily invalidated and weakened simply by the practices of other people.

author: STAND League
text: To our friends and partners in the Jewish community, #HappyHanukkah. We stand with you for religious freedom‚Äîand against antisemitism‚Äîduring this Festival of Lights, and all year round.

author: Jay Michaelson
text: Happy Hanukkah. Hanukkah was originally a militaristic, jingoistic holiday celebrating theocracy. Over time, it evolved to become (for some of us) a celebration of religious freedom and pluralism. Change is possible. Myths evolve.

author: Arsen Ostrovsky
text:
I wrote this in 
@JNS_org
 two years ago. Even more relevant today.

"Although #Chanukah is a uniquely Jewish story, its lessons about the importance of preserving our religious freedom are universal, irrespective of individual faith or background."

author: The Troll
text:
The Bill is designed for one thing and one thing only. 
To enable the Gay Community to sue any Church/Synagogue/Mosque if the refuse to do a ceremony for a gay couple. If say the Catholic church refuses to marry a gay couple. They lose their Tax Exemptions and Religious Freedom.

author: Washington Examiner
text: The US cares about religious freedom abroad, but at home? Not so much

author: Deep Thoughts, Secret Knight
text: Today's Fox stupid: very upset the Catholic Church exercised their religious freedom to fire an activist priest Fox agrees with. Religious freedom is only for Fox hatred

author: Ben Yehuda Press | @benyehudapress@kibitz.cloud
text: Obviously, we‚Äôre not going to let any tyrannical geek tell us what to put in our profile. Certainly not during this festival of religious freedom achieved through guerrilla warfare and Sabbath violation.

author: U.K Regional Crime, Undecided voter.
text: I do believe in people ls rights to have religious freedom as long as my rights to think it‚Äôs a load of codswallop are respected too because if my rights to think this are suppressed in any way then I‚Äôm going to be mightily pissed off.
